titles.title: A bill to allow the obsolete submarine ex-Growler (ex-SSG-577) to be transferred to the Intrepid Sea-Air-Space Museum in New York before the expiration of the otherwise applicable 60-day congressional review period.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials.
Reported to House by House Committee on Armed Services. Report No: 100-806.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

committee.subcommittee: Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials
committee.name: House Armed Services

bill.summary: 5/24/1988--Introduced. Allows the obsolete submarine ex-Growler to be transferred to the Intrepid Sea-Air-Space Museum in New York before the expiration of the otherwise-applicable 60-day congressional review period.
